string.value: The time has come. If you want to find out more about Dawn Warrior, the Warrior of Light, talk to #b#p1101003#, the Chief Knight of Light#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a #bDawn Warrior#k accompanied with honor and glory, you should select #p1101003#.
You are now a Dawn Warrior!

Are you someone that strives to become a knight? My name is #p1101003#, the #bChief Knight of Light leading the Dawn Warriors#k in Cygnus Knights. If you wish to become the Dawn Warrior, then you'll be in my hands.

The foundation of being a Dawn Warrior is becoming both a warrior and swordsman. It requires strength, power, and stamina to defeat monsters that are up-close. #bHigh STR is a priority, but a dose of DEX is just as required to achieve balance#k. That being said, this only makes you a warrior, not a Dawn Warrior.

Dawn Warriors are the special few that receive divine protection from the Spirit of Light. That's why the Dawn Warriors are #bconstantly accompanied by Soul the spirit of light#k. If you indeed become the Dawn Warrior, then Soul will be equal parts companion, comrade, and savior, sticking by you through thick and thin.

Being a Dawn Warrior requires one to have a clear head, deadly sword, warm heart, and an eternal loyalty towards the Empress. If you are willing to develop these qualities, then come. I will be waiting here, ready to make you a Dawn Warrior.
